attributes.name: script
script
script
script
attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f3.Hearing:'
var err_var = [
'RES_LEFT_1KT_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_1K_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_2K_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_3K_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_4K_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_500_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_6K_ERR',
'RES_LEFT_8K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_1KT_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_1K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_2K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_3K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_4K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_500_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_6K_ERR',
'RES_RIGHT_8K_ERR'
]

// ensure error code is upper cased!!!
var code = {
  NO_RESPONSE:0,
  NO_RESPONSE_1K:0,
  VERIFY_FAILED_1K:0,
  NO_THRESHOLD:0,
  NO_THRESHOLD_AGAIN:0,
  TOO_MANY_FAILURES:0,
  AA:0,
  E1:0,
  E2:0,
  E3:0,
  E4:0,
  E5:0,
  E6:0,
  E7:0,
  E8:0,
  EE:0,
  EF:0
}

for(var i=0; i<err_var.length; i++) {
  var v = $(stage + err_var[i]).upperCase()
  if(v.isNull().not().value()) {
    code[v.value()]++
  }
}

var res = null
var str = []
for(var v in code) {
  if(0<code[v]) {
    str.push('"'+v+'":' + code[v])
  }  
}
if(0<str.length) {
  res = newValue('{'+str.join(',')+'}','text')
}
res
